description:
Simulate a real looking and sounding phone call on your Palm SmartPhone. Use this simple application to get out of boring meetings, lunches, bad dates or any other situation that you can think of. Play any number of pranks on your friends. Set the time you want the Bogus Call to take place and hit the start button..it's that simple. The Bogus Call will appear on your phone at the designated time. Full integration to contacts (with photo display) and ringtones ensures a very simple setup. Never get stuck again - let Bogus Caller help you out of any situation!! 
The new update adds support for contact profile photo's.
